LanguageData.Chemistry.description: Learn to produce basic chemical compounds.

LanguageData.ChemistryChems.description: Production of basic chemical for drug production.

LanguageData.ChemistryDissolution.description: Break down complex chemical molecules to ionic mass.

LanguageData.ChemistryGasesChlorine.label: chlorine gas
LanguageData.ChemistryGasesChlorine.description: Chlorine is a yellow-green gas at room temperature. It is an extremely reactive element and a strong oxidising agent.
LanguageData.ChemistryGasesMustard.label: mustard gas
LanguageData.ChemistryGasesMustard.description: Sulfur mustard, commonly known as mustard gas, is the prototypical substance of the sulfur-based family of cytotoxic and vesicant chemical warfare agents.
LanguageData.ChemistryGasesSarin.label: sarin gas
LanguageData.ChemistryGasesSarin.description: Sarin is a highly toxic synthetic organophosphorus compound used as a chemical weapon due to its extreme potency as a nerve agent.

LanguageData.ChemistryPlasteel.description: Production of noble metals and laboratory compounds.
LanguageData.ChemistryPower.label: chemical fire
LanguageData.ChemistryPower.description: Learn how to use chemical compounds to induce high temperature burn.
LanguageData.ChemistryRecombination.label: chemical recombination
LanguageData.ChemistryRefinement.label: chemical refinement
LanguageData.ChemistryVolatile.label: volatile chemicals
LanguageData.ChemistryVolatile.description: Production of volatile and dangerous chemicals.
